member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setViewportMode(AppVarjo::VIEWPORT)
member.summary: Sets the viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.param: Viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getViewportMode const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating the current viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.returns: Current viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setHeadPositionLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head position.
member.param: true to lock the head position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setHeadRotationLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head rotation.
member.param: true to lock the head rotation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isHeadPositionLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head position is locked.
member.returns: true if the head position is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isHeadRotationLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head rotation is locked.
member.returns: true if the head rotation is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getMaxTrackedDeviceCount const
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of tracked devices.
member.returns: The maximum value of tracked devices.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerStateAxisCount const
member.summary: Returns a number of axes.
member.returns: Number of axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDevicePose(int)
member.summary: Returns a single pose for a tracked device.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device velocity in tracker space, in meters per second.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceAngularVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device angular velocity, in radians per second.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Angular velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isDeviceConnected(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device connected to the slot.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: true - connected; false - not connected.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isPoseValid(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device pose is valid.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: true - valid; false - invalid.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getTrackingResult(int)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating the tracking result: Uninitialized Calibrating in progress Calibrating out of range Running correctly Running out of range
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Tracking result.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceType(int)
member.summary: Returns the device type.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Device type, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceAxisType(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the value that identifies what type of axis is on the indicated controller.
member.param: Device ID.
Axis number.
member.returns: Axis of a corresponding type. One of the AXIS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerPacketNum(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of the controller packet.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Number of the controller packet.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerButtonPressed(int,AppVarjo::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is pressed.
member.param: Device ID.
A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerButtonTouched(int,AppVarjo::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is touched.
member.param: Device ID.
A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerAxis(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the specified controller axis along the X and Y axes.
member.param: Device ID.
Axis number.
member.returns: X and Y in the range of [-1;1] ([0;1] for a trigger).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setControllerVibration(int,unsignedshort)
member.summary: Sets the vibration of the given duration and amplitude.
member.param: Device ID.
Duration of the vibration.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isEyeTrackingValid const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if eye tracking is valid.
member.returns: true if eye tracking is valid; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFocusWorldPosition const
member.summary: Returns the position of the eye focus point in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the eye focus point.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.requestCalibration
member.summary: Triggers the gaze calibration sequence, if gaze tracking has been enabled in Varjo settings and the Varjo system is in a state where it can bring up the calibration UI.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeWorldPosition const
member.summary: Returns the position of the left eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the left eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeWorldDirection const
member.summary: Returns the direction vector of the left eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector of the left eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeWorldPosition const
member.summary: Returns the position of the right eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeWorldDirection const
member.summary: Returns the direction vector of the right eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector of the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getGazeWorldDirection const
member.summary: Returns the gaze direction vector, which is a combined value for both eyes, in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector for both eyes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyePupilSize const
member.summary: Returns the size of the left eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1 calculated according to the pupil size range detected by the Varjo headset.
member.returns: The size of the left eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyePupilSize const
member.summary: Returns the size of the right eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1 calculated according to the pupil size range detected by the Varjo headset.
member.returns: The size of the right eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCaptureTime const
member.summary: Returns the timestamp of when the data was recorded, in nanoseconds.
member.returns: Timestamp of when the data was recorded, in nanoseconds.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFocusDistance const
member.summary: Returns the distance between the eye and the focus point. It is a value between 0 and 2 meters.
member.returns: The distance between the eye and the focus point.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getStability const
member.summary: Returns a value between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the stability of the user’s focus. 0.0 means not stable and 1.0 means stable.
member.returns: A value between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the stability of the user’s focus. 0.0 means not stable and 1.0 means stable.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getEyeTrackingStatus const
member.summary: Returns a value representing the status of eye tracking in the Varjo headsets.
member.returns: Value representing the status of eye tracking in the Varjo headsets, one of the EYETRACKING_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeStatus const
member.summary: Returns a value representing the tracking status for the left eye.
member.returns: Value representing the tracking status for the left eye, one of the EYE_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeStatus const
member.summary: Returns a value representing the tracking status for the right eye.
member.returns: Value representing the tracking status for the right eye, one of the EYE_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFrameNum const
member.summary: Returns a unique identifier of the frame when the data was recorded.
member.returns: Unique identifier of the frame when the data was recorded.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setVisualizerEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Toggles visualizer.
member.param: true to enable visualizer; false to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isVisualizerEnabled const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if visualizer is enabled.
member.returns: true if visualizer is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerRole(int)
member.summary: Returns a specific role associated with a tracked device.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Role associated with a tracked device. One of the CONTROLLER_ROLE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceManufacturerName(int)
member.summary: Returns the manufacturer name of the specified device.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Manufacturer name.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceModelNumber(int)
member.summary: Returns the model number of the specified device.
member.param: Device ID.
member.returns: Model number.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isMixedRealityAvaliable const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if mixed reality mode is available. Mixed reality enables you to combine real-world view from front-facing cameras mounted on the headset with the VR image rendered.
member.returns: Flag: true if mixed reality mode is available; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setFoveatedRenderingEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if foveated rendering is enabled. Foveated rendering makes use of the eye tracking functionality in Varjo headsets to improve performance by reducing the image quality in peripheral areas where the user is not looking. Foveation allows applications to render fewer pixels and achieve a better VR experience.
member.param: Set true to enable foveated rendering; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isFoveatedRenderingEnabled const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if foveated rendering is enabled. Foveated rendering makes use of the eye tracking functionality in Varjo headsets to improve performance by reducing the image quality in peripheral areas where the user is not looking. Foveation allows applications to render fewer pixels and achieve a better VR experience.
member.returns: Flag: true if foveated rendering is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setAlphaBlend(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if alpha blending is enabled. This option enables blending VR and AR images using the alpha channel.
member.param: Set true to enable alpha blending; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isAlphaBlend const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if alpha blending is enabled. This option enables blending VR and AR images using the alpha channel.
member.returns: Flag: true if alpha blending is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setAlphaInvert(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if alpha channel is inverted before using it for blending VR and AR images.
member.param: Set true to use inverted alpha channel inversion; or false - to use alpha channel as is.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isAlphaInvert const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if alpha channel is inverted before using it for blending VR and AR images.
member.returns: Flag: true if alpha channel inversion is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setVideo(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if video signal from the real-world view from the front-facing HMD-mounted cameras is enabled. The real-world view is used for combining virtual and real-world elements to create an immersive experience in mixed reality.
member.param: Set true to enable the real-world view from the front-facing HMD-mounted cameras; or false - to disable it (VR-only mode).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isVideo const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if video signal from the real-world view from the front-facing HMD-mounted cameras is enabled. The real-world view is used for combining virtual and real-world elements to create an immersive experience in mixed reality.
member.returns: Flag: true if real-world view from the front-facing HMD-mounted cameras is enabled; otherwise - false (VR-only mode).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setDepthTest(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if depth testing is enabled.
member.param: Set true to enable depth testing; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isDepthTest const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if depth testing is enabled.
member.returns: Flag: true if depth testing is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setDepthTestRangeEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if depth testing range is enabled. Use DepthTestRange ( Depth Test Near Z, Depth Test Far Z) to control the range for which the depth test is evaluated.
member.param: Set true to enable depth testing range; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isDepthTestRangeEnabled const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if depth testing range is enabled. Use DepthTestRange ( Depth Test Near Z, Depth Test Far Z) to control the range for which the depth test is evaluated.
member.returns: Flag: true if depth testing range is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setDepthTestRange(Unigine.Math.dvec2)
member.summary: Sets a new depth testing range as a two-component vector.
member.param: New depth testing range to be set: (Depth Test Near Z, Depth Test Far Z). The range for each component in meters is[0.0, 50.0]. The default depth test range is set to [0.0, 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDepthTestRange const
member.summary: Returns the current depth testing range as a two-component vector.
member.returns: Current depth testing range: (Depth Test Near Z, Depth Test Far Z). The range for each component in meters is[0.0, 50.0]. The default depth test range is set to [0.0, 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setChromaKey(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if chroma keying is enabled. Chroma keying is a video technique where a predefined color is replaced with virtual content. Usually the color to be replaced is bright green or bright blue, as those colors contrast the most with human skin.
member.param: Set true to enable chroma keying; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isChromaKey const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if chroma keying is enabled.
member.returns: Flag: true if chroma keying is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getChromaKeyConfigNum const
member.summary: Returns the number of chroma key config indices supported. The maximum index will be count-1.
member.returns: Number of supported chroma key configs.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.chromaKeyConfigSubmit(int) const
member.summary: Applies the chroma key configuration with the specified index.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getChromaKeyConfigType(int) const
member.summary: Returns the type of the chroma key configuration with the specified index. Each chroma key configuration index has a config type, which can be used to determine if the slot in the current index is being used. Active configurations have the HSV type.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
member.returns: Chroma key configuration type.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setChromaKeyConfigType(int,AppVarjo::CHROMAKEY_TYPE)
member.summary: Sets a new type for the chroma key configuration with the specified index. Each chroma key configuration index has a config type, which can be used to determine if the slot in the current index is being used. Active configurations have the HSV type.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
New chroma key configuration type to be set.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getChromaKeyConfigFalloff(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
member.returns: Current tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setChromaKeyConfigFalloff(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
New tolerance falloff values to be set for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getChromaKeyConfigTargetColor(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
member.returns: Current chroma key target color in HSV colorspace. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setChromaKeyConfigTargetColor(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets a new chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
New chroma key target color to be set in HSV colorspace. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getChromaKeyConfigTolerance(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
member.returns: Current tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setChromaKeyConfigTolerance(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range fron 0 toconfig count - 1.
New tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color to be set. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraExposureTime(double)
member.summary: Sets a new exposure time value for the camera.
member.param: New exposure time to be set, in frames per second (e.g. 90.0 -> ~11ms).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCameraExposureTime const
member.summary: Returns the current exposure time for the camera.
member.returns: Current exposure time, in frames per second (e.g. 90.0 -> ~11ms).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraExposureTimeAuto const
member.summary: Enables automatic exposure adjustment mode for the camera.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraExposureTimeManual const
member.summary: Enables manual exposure adjustment mode for the camera. In this mode you can set the desired exposure time correction value manually via the setCameraExposureTime() method.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isCameraExposureTimeAuto const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if automatic exposure adjustment mode for the camera is enabled.
member.returns: true if automatic exposure adjustment mode for the camera is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraWhiteBalance(int)
member.summary: Sets a new white balance correction value for the camera.
member.param: New color temperature value to be set, in Kelvin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCameraWhiteBalance const
member.summary: Returns the current white balance correction value for the camera.
member.returns: Current color temperature value, in Kelvin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraWhiteBalanceAuto const
member.summary: Enables automatic white balance adjustment mode for the camera.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraWhiteBalanceManual const
member.summary: Enables manual white balance adjustment mode for the camera. In this mode you can set the desired white balance correction value manually via the getCameraWhiteBalance() method.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isCameraWhiteBalanceAuto const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if automatic white balance adjustment mode for the camera is enabled.
member.returns: true if automatic white balance adjustment mode for the camera is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraISO(int)
member.summary: Sets a new ISO value for the camera.
member.param: New ISO value to be set (e.g., "200" -> ISO200).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCameraISO const
member.summary: Returns the current ISO value for the camera.
member.returns: Current ISO value set for the camera (e.g., "200" -> ISO200).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraISOAuto const
member.summary: Enables automatic ISO adjustment mode for the camera.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraISOManual const
member.summary: Enables manual ISO adjustment mode for the camera. In this mode you can set the desired ISO value manually via the setCameraISO() method.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isCameraISOAuto const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if automatic ISO adjustment mode for the camera is enabled.
member.returns: true if automatic ISO adjustment mode for the camera is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraFlickerCompensation(int)
member.summary: Sets a new flicker compensation value for the camera. This is useful when using the HMD indoors with mostly artificial light bulbs, which flicker at the frequency of 50Hz or 60Hz and can cause visual flicker artifacts on the video see through image. The correct setting depends on the underlying power grid's frequency. e.g. In most parts of Africa/Asia/Australia/Europe the frequency is 50 Hz and in most parts of North and South America 60 Hz.
member.param: Flicker compensation value, in Hz (e.g "50" -> compensation for 50 Hz).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCameraFlickerCompensation const
member.summary: Returns the current flicker compensation value for the camera.
member.returns: Current flicker compensation value, in Hz (e.g "50" -> compensation for 50 Hz).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setCameraSharpness(int)
member.summary: Sets a new sharpness filter power value for the camera.
member.param: New sharpness filter power value to be set: lowest value (0) corresponds to small amount of filtering and the highest value corresponds to the largest amount of filtering.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCameraSharpness const
member.summary: Returns the current sharpness filter power value for the camera.
member.returns: Current sharpness filter power value: lowest value (0) corresponds to small amount of filtering and the highest value corresponds to the largest amount of filtering.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setMarkerTrackingEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if marker tracking is enabled.
member.param: Set true to enable marker tracking; or false - to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isMarkerTrackingEnabled const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if marker tracking is enabled.

member.summary: Sets a lifetime for markers under specified ids.
member.param: Lifetime to be set.
Marker ids to receive a new lifetime.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setMarkerLifetime(float,unsignedlonglong)
member.summary: Sets a lifetime for a marker under specified id.
member.param: Lifetime to be set.
A marker id to receive a new lifetime.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setMarkerFlags(AppVarjo::MARKER_FLAGS,Unigine.Vector{unsignedlonglong,int,Unigine.VectorAllocator})
member.summary: Sets the flags for all markers by specified ids.
member.param: New flags to set up.
Marker ids to receive new flags.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setMarkerFlags(AppVarjo::MARKER_FLAGS,unsignedlonglong)
member.summary: Sets the flags for a marker by a specified id.
member.param: New flags to set up.
Marker id to receive new flags.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getMarkerObjectNum const
member.summary: Returns the number of visible marker objects.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.VIEWPORT_BLACK_SCREEN
member.summary: No image (black screen).

member.summary: Mono image.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.VIEWPORT_STEREO

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_INVALID
member.summary: A tracked device with an invalid index.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_HMD
member.summary: A tracked head-mounted display.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_CONTROLLER
member.summary: A tracked controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_GENERIC_TRACKER
member.summary: A tracked tracker device.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_TRACKING
member.summary: A tracked camera and base stations that serve as tracking reference points.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_NONE
member.summary: No axis is identified on the controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_TRACKPAD
member.summary: An axis of a trackpad type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_JOYSTICK
member.summary: An axis of a joystick type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_TRIGGER
member.summary: An axis of a trigger type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_SYSTEM
member.summary: The system button. These events are not visible to applications and are used internally to bring up the Steam Overlay or the Steam Client.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_APPLICATIONMENU
member.summary: The application menu button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_GRIP
member.summary: The grip button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_LEFT
member.summary: The sensor panel left button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_UP
member.summary: The sensor panel up button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_RIGHT
member.summary: The sensor panel right button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_DOWN
member.summary: The sensor panel down button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_A
member.summary: The button reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS0
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS1
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS2
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS3
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS4
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TOUCHPAD
member.summary: The touchpad on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS0.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TRIGGER
member.summary: The trigger on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS1.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DASHBOARD_BACK
member.summary: The back to dashboard button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_MAX
member.summary: This is not an actual button. It just indicates the maximum number of buttons in the system.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Data is not available, user is not wearing the device or eyes cannot be found.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_ADJUST
member.summary: User is wearing the device, but gaze tracking is being calibrated.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_VALID
member.summary: Data is valid.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Eye is not tracked and not visible (for example, eye is shut).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_VISIBLE
member.summary: Eye is visible but not reliably tracked (for example, saccade or blink).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_COMPENSATED
member.summary: Eye is tracked but quality compromised (for example, headset has moved after calibration).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_TRACKED
member.summary: Eye is tracked.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_INVALID
member.summary: Invalid value for controller type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_LEFT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the left hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_RIGHT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_OPT_OUT
member.summary: Tracked device is opting out of left/right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_TREADMILL
member.summary: Tracked device is a treadmill.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_MAX
member.summary: Indicates the maximum number of controller roles.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CHROMAKEY_TYPE_HSV
member.summary: HSV chroma key config.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CHROMAKEY_TYPE_DISABLED
member.summary: Disabled chroma key config.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_CONFIDENCE
member.summary: Pose has confidence information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_ACCELERATION
member.summary: Pose has acceleration information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_ANGULAR_VELOCITY
member.summary: Pose has angular velocity information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_VELOCITY
member.summary: Pose has velocity information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_ROTATION
member.summary: Pose has rotation information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_HAS_POSITION
member.summary: Pose has position information.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_TRACING_DISCONNECTED
member.summary: Tracking subsystem is not connected and poses cannot be acquired.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_TRACING_LOST
member.summary: Pose has been tracked but currently is not detected by the tracking subsystem.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_POSE_FLAGS_TRACING_OK
member.summary: Pose is being currently tracked.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.MARKER_FLAGS_DO_PREDICTION
member.summary: Marker pose is predicted. If not specified, the latest detected pose is used.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.ENVIRONMENT_MODE_OVERLAP
member.summary: Environment mode that sets the environment texture substituting the sky.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.ENVIRONMENT_MODE_PRESET
member.summary: Environment mode that sets the cubemap defining the color for the environment preset that retains the sky color, haze, etc.
